Headline: #151 Sheridan & #156 LaSalle Temporary Reroute near Belmont/Sheridan-Broadway
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan & 156 LaSalle buses temp. rerouted NB: Sheridan, Belmont, Addison & Halsted; SB Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan & #156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Belmont/Sheridan-Broadway.

Northbound buses will operate via Sheridan, Belmont, Addison and Halsted.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays from O'Hare.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays from O'Hare.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
